item.title: Meeting Records
item.description: Meeting Records # When a synchronous meeting is unavoidable, it is critical to produce a clear and thorough record. The meeting record is important as a reference for what happened at the meeting. In particular, any decisions made or actions assigned need to be clearly recorded for future reference. A good record will also be invaluable to anyone who was not able to attend an in person meeting. Meeting Record Template # Below is a suggested template for a meeting record document.
